key.name: theme
key.description: The theme of Srain.

key.name: csd
key.description: Enable Client-Side Decoration or not.

key.name: send-on-ctrl-enter
key.description: Send messsage on CTRL+Enter pressed.

key.name: exit-on-close
key.description: Exit program on main window closed.

key.name: auto-connect
key.description: Servers that are auto connected after startup.

key.name: server-list
key.description: Servers that are avaliable to Srain.

key.name: debug-targets
key.description: Files with debug log level

key.name: info-targets
key.description: Files with debug log level

key.name: warn-targets
key.description: Files with warning log level

key.name: error-targets
key.description: Files with error log level

key.name: name
key.description: The name of the server. Will be ignored for global config.

key.name: addresses
key.description: Server addresses. Will be ignored for global config.

key.name: tls
key.description: Connect with TLS. Will be ignored for global config.

key.name: tls-noverify
key.description: Don't verify TLS certificate when connecting via TLS. Will be ignored for global config.

key.name: encoding
key.description: Encoding for the server. Can also be a global config. All useable values are the output of `iconv --list`, case-insenstive.

key.name: ipv6
key.description: Use IPv6 for connecting to the server (not implmented). Will be ignored for global config.

key.name: auto-join
key.description: Chats that are auto joined after server is created.

key.name: auto-run
key.description: Commands that are auto run after server is created.

key.name: user-nickname
key.description: Nickname of the user.

key.name: user-username
key.description: Username of the user.

key.name: user-realname
key.description: Realname of the user.

key.name: login-method
key.description: How to identify your nick. Avaliable values: "none": Disables any login method. "nickserv": Identify you with the /NICKSERV command. "msg-nickserv": Identify you with /msg NickServ identify. "sasl-plain": Identify you by loginning in with SASL PLAIN. "sasl-ecdsa": Identify you by loginning in with SASL ECDSA-NIST256P-CHALLENGE, which require a certificate file.

key.name: login-certificate
key.description: For login method SASL ECDSA-NIST256P-CHALLENGE, this is the path of the certificate file.

key.name: part-message
key.description: Message sent when you left a channel.

key.name: kick-message
key.description: Message sent when you are kicked.

key.name: away-message
key.description: Default away message when you use the command /away without writing a reason.

key.name: quit-message
key.description: Message sent when you quit.

key.name: chat-list
key.description: List of chats. Can also be a global config.

key.name: log
key.description: Store persistent chat log.

key.name: notify
key.description: Send notification when you are mentioned by others or receiving any ERROR message.

key.name: notify-all
key.description: Send notification when receiving any PRIVMSG/ACTION/NOTIFY/ERROR message.

key.name: show-topic
key.description: Show topic in the chat window.

key.name: show-avatar
key.description: Show avatars in the chat window.

key.name: show-user-list
key.description: Show user list on the right of the chat window.

key.name: render-mirc-color
key.description: Render mIRC escape sequences.

key.name: nick-completion-suffix
key.description: Suffix of completed nick name e.g. "nick: msg"

key.name: preview-url
key.description: Show previewer for every URL.

key.name: auto-preview-url
key.description: Automatically preview supported URL.

key.name: auto-run
key.description: Commands that are auto run after chat is created.
